Dear Hagop,

 

Trust you are doing well.

 

Please be advised that the Commercial Crime cover is due for renewal on 21/10/2025.

 

Kindly arrange to complete the attached Commercial Crime proposal forms at your earliest convenience, so we may proceed with obtaining the renewal terms.

 

Attached current policy copy for your reference.

 

Await your reply to proceed further.

 

 

Swapna Pyambil MBA, AIII

Relationship Manager - Agency

Dear Hagop,

 

Trust this mail finds you well. I am attaching copy of last year’s proposal for ready reference.

Anil Kumar
